trans-unit.source: Provides an abstract class for supporting formatting services to a line of text.
trans-unit.target: 為文字行提供用來支援格式化服務的抽象類別。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextLine" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextLine" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: <c>pixelsPerDip</c> should be set to the TextSource's PixelsPerDip value.
trans-unit.target: <c>pixelsPerDip</c> 應設定為 TextSource 的 PixelsPerDip 值。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextLine" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextLine" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: This constructor must be called for every class that is inherited from <xref:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextLine>.
trans-unit.target: 必須針對每個都繼承自的類別呼叫這個建構函式<xref:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextLine>。

trans-unit.source: Gets the distance from the top to the baseline of the current <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextLine" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 取得目前 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextLine" /> 物件頂端到基準線的距離。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Double" /> that represents the baseline distance.
trans-unit.target: 表示基準線距離的 <see cref="T:System.Double" />。

trans-unit.source: A list of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextCollapsingProperties" /> objects that represent the collapsed text properties.
trans-unit.target: 表示摺疊文字屬性的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextCollapsingProperties" /> 物件清單。

trans-unit.source: Create a collapsed line based on collapsed text properties.
trans-unit.target: 根據摺疊文字屬性建立摺疊行。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextLine" /> value that represents a collapsed line that can be displayed.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextLine" /> 值，這個值表示可以顯示的摺疊行。

trans-unit.source: Gets the number of characters following the last character of the line that may trigger reformatting of the current line.
trans-unit.target: 取得該行最後一個字元後的字元數目，這些字元會觸發目前行的重新格式化。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Int32" /> value that represents the number of characters.
trans-unit.target: 表示字元數目的 <see cref="T:System.Int32" /> 值。

trans-unit.source: Releases all managed and unmanaged resources used by the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextFormatter" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 釋放 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextFormatter" /> 物件使用的所有 Managed 和 Unmanaged 資源。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.DrawingContext" /> object onto which the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextLine" /> is rendered.
trans-unit.target: 要在其中呈現 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.DrawingContext" /> 的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextLine" /> 物件。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Point" /> value that represents the drawing origin.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Point" /> 值，這個值表示繪圖原點。

trans-unit.source: An enumerated <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.InvertAxes" /> value that indicates the inversion of the horizontal and vertical axes of the drawing surface.
trans-unit.target: 列舉的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.InvertAxes" /> 值，這個值表示繪圖介面的水平和垂直軸之反向。

trans-unit.source: Renders the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextLine" /> object based upon the specified <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.DrawingContext" />.
trans-unit.target: 根據指定的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.DrawingContext" /> 來呈現 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextLine" /> 物件。

trans-unit.source: Gets the distance from the top-most to bottom-most black pixel in a line.
trans-unit.target: 取得行中最頂端黑色像素到最底端黑色像素的距離。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Double" /> that represents the extent distance.
trans-unit.target: 表示延伸距離的 <see cref="T:System.Double" />。

trans-unit.source: The current <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.CharacterHit" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 目前的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.CharacterHit" /> 物件。

trans-unit.source: Gets the previous character hit after backspacing.
trans-unit.target: 取得退格後點擊的上一個字元。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.CharacterHit" /> object after backspacing.
trans-unit.target: 退格後的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.CharacterHit" /> 物件。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Double" /> value that represents the distance from the beginning of the line.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Double" /> 值，這個值表示與行開頭的距離。

trans-unit.source: Gets the character hit corresponding to the specified distance from the beginning of the line.
trans-unit.target: 取得字元點擊，此字元點擊對應於與行開頭的指定距離。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.CharacterHit" /> object at the specified <paramref name="distance" /> from the beginning of the line.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.CharacterHit" /> 物件，這個物件位於與行開頭的指定 <paramref name="distance" />。

trans-unit.source: The text flow direction determines how the distance is measured.
trans-unit.target: 文字流動方向決定距離的測量方式。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.CharacterHit" /> object whose distance you want to query.
trans-unit.target: 您想要查詢其距離的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.CharacterHit" /> 物件。

trans-unit.source: Gets the distance from the beginning of the line to the specified character hit.
trans-unit.target: 取得從行開頭到指定之字元點擊的距離。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Double" /> that represents the distance from the beginning of the line.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Double" />，表示與行開頭的距離。

trans-unit.source: The text flow direction determines how the distance is measured.
trans-unit.target: 文字流動方向決定距離的測量方式。

trans-unit.source: Gets an enumerator for enumerating <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.IndexedGlyphRun" /> objects in the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextLine" />.
trans-unit.target: 取得列舉值，用於列舉 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.IndexedGlyphRun" /> 中的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextLine" /> 物件。

trans-unit.source: An enumerator that allows you to enumerate each <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.IndexedGlyphRun" /> object in the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextLine" />.
trans-unit.target: 列舉值，可讓您列舉 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.IndexedGlyphRun" /> 中的每個 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextLine" /> 物件。

trans-unit.source: By enumerating through the list of <xref:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.IndexedGlyphRun> objects, the text layout client can obtain glyph information for each text source character.
trans-unit.target: 透過清單列舉<xref:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.IndexedGlyphRun>物件文字配置用戶端可以取得來源的每個文字字元圖像 （glyph） 資訊。

trans-unit.source: The current <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.CharacterHit" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 目前的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.CharacterHit" /> 物件。

trans-unit.source: Gets the next character hit for caret navigation.
trans-unit.target: 取得要進行插入號巡覽的下一個字元點擊。

trans-unit.source: The next <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.CharacterHit" /> object based on caret navigation.
trans-unit.target: 根據插入號巡覽的下一個 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.CharacterHit" /> 物件。

trans-unit.source: The current <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.CharacterHit" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 目前的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.CharacterHit" /> 物件。

trans-unit.source: Gets the previous character hit for caret navigation.
trans-unit.target: 取得要進行插入號巡覽的上一個字元點擊。

trans-unit.source: The previous <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.CharacterHit" /> object based on caret navigation.
trans-unit.target: 根據插入號巡覽的上一個 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.CharacterHit" /> 物件。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Int32" /> value that represents the index of first character of specified range.
trans-unit.target: 表示指定範圍中第一個字元之索引的 <see cref="T:System.Int32" /> 值。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Int32" /> value that represents the number of characters of the specified range.
trans-unit.target: 表示指定範圍之字元數的 <see cref="T:System.Int32" /> 值。

trans-unit.source: Gets an array of bounding rectangles that represent the range of characters within a text line.
trans-unit.target: 取得週框陣列，這些週框表示文字行內的字元範圍。

trans-unit.source: A list of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextBounds" /> objects representing the bounding rectangle.
trans-unit.target: 表示週框的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextBounds" /> 物件清單。

trans-unit.source: Gets a collection of collapsed text ranges after a line has been collapsed.
trans-unit.target: 取得摺疊一行之後的摺疊文字範圍集合。

trans-unit.source: A list of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextCollapsedRange" /> objects that represent the collapsed text.
trans-unit.target: 表示摺疊文字的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextCollapsedRange" /> 物件清單。

trans-unit.source: Gets the state of the line when broken by line breaking process.
trans-unit.target: 取得遭到分行符號處理序分行時的行狀態。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextLineBreak" /> value that represents the line break.
trans-unit.target: 表示分行符號的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextLineBreak" /> 值。

trans-unit.source: The return value is `null` when the line ends at the end of the paragraph.
trans-unit.target: 傳回值是`null`行結尾的段落結尾。

trans-unit.source: The text formatter client may pass the return value back as a parameter to the <xref:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextFormatter.FormatLine%2A> method, which allows the value to be used when formatting the next line within the same paragraph.
trans-unit.target: 文字格式器用戶端可能會以參數來傳回傳遞傳回值<xref:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextFormatter.FormatLine%2A>方法，可讓相同的段落中的下一行的格式時所要使用的值。

trans-unit.source: Gets a collection of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextRun" /> objects in a text span that are contained within a line.
trans-unit.target: 取得文字範圍中包含在一行內的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextRun" /> 物件集合。

trans-unit.source: Gets a list of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextRun" /> objects contained within a text span.
trans-unit.target: 取得包含在文字範圍內的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextRun" /> 物件清單。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the line is collapsed.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，這個值指出行是否摺疊。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" />, if the line is collapsed; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果行已經摺疊，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether content of the line overflows the specified paragraph width.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，這個值表示行內容是否超出指定的段落寬度。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" />, it the line overflows the specified paragraph width; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果行超出指定的段落寬度，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets the height of a line of text.
trans-unit.target: 取得文字行的高度。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Double" /> that represents the text line height.
trans-unit.target: 表示文字行高度的 <see cref="T:System.Double" />。

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the text line is truncated in the middle of a word.
trans-unit.target: 判斷文字行是否在一個字組的中間截斷。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the text line is truncated in the middle of a word; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果文字行在一個字組的中間截斷，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextLine.IsTruncated%2A> property value is set only when the <xref:System.Windows.TextWrapping> property of <xref:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextParagraphProperties> is set to <xref:System.Windows.TextWrapping.Wrap>, and a single word is wider than the formatting paragraph width.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextLine.IsTruncated%2A>屬性值設定時，才<xref:System.Windows.TextWrapping>屬性<xref:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextParagraphProperties>設<xref:System.Windows.TextWrapping.Wrap>，和一個單字是大於格式化的段落寬度。

trans-unit.source: In such situation, <xref:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextFormatter> truncates the line in the middle of the word to honor the desired behavior specified by <xref:System.Windows.TextWrapping.Wrap> setting.
trans-unit.target: 在這種情況下，<xref:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextFormatter>截斷接受所要的行為所指定之單字中間列<xref:System.Windows.TextWrapping.Wrap>設定。

trans-unit.source: Gets the total number of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextSource" /> positions of the current line.
trans-unit.target: 取得目前行的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextSource" /> 位置總數。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Int32" /> value that represents the total number of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextSource" /> positions of the current line.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Int32" /> 值，這個值表示目前行的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextSource" /> 位置總數。

trans-unit.source: Gets the distance from the edge of the line's highest point to the baseline marker of the line.
trans-unit.target: 取得從行最高點的邊緣到行基準線標記的距離。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Double" /> that represents the baseline distance of the marker.
trans-unit.target: 表示標記之基準線距離的 <see cref="T:System.Double" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets the height of a marker for a list item.
trans-unit.target: 取得清單項目之標記的高度。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Double" /> that represents the height of the marker.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Double" />，表示標記的高度。

trans-unit.source: Gets the number of newline characters at the end of a line.
trans-unit.target: 取得位於行尾的新行字元數目。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Int32" /> value that represents the number of newline characters.
trans-unit.target: 表示新行字元數目的 <see cref="T:System.Int32" /> 值。

trans-unit.source: Gets the distance that black pixels extend beyond the bottom alignment edge of a line.
trans-unit.target: 取得黑色像素延伸超過行底端對齊邊緣的距離。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Double" /> that represents the overhang after distance.
trans-unit.target: 表示突出部分後方距離的 <see cref="T:System.Double" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets the distance that black pixels extend prior to the left leading alignment edge of the line.
trans-unit.target: 取得黑色像素延伸到行的左前置對齊邊緣之前的距離。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Double" /> that represents the overhang leading distance.
trans-unit.target: 表示突出部分前方距離的 <see cref="T:System.Double" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets the distance that black pixels extend following the right trailing alignment edge of the line.
trans-unit.target: 取得黑色像素延伸到行的右結尾對齊邊緣後面的距離。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Double" /> that represents the overhang trailing distance.
trans-unit.target: 表示突出部分結尾距離的 <see cref="T:System.Double" />。

trans-unit.source: Get or sets the PixelsPerDip at which the text should be rendered.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定應轉譯文字的 PixelsPerDip。

trans-unit.source: The current <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextLine.PixelsPerDip" /> value.
trans-unit.target: 目前的 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextLine.PixelsPerDip" /> 值。

trans-unit.source: Gets the distance from the start of a paragraph to the starting point of a line.
trans-unit.target: 取得從段落開頭到行起點的距離。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Double" /> value that represents the distance from the start of a paragraph to the starting point of a line.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Double" /> 值，這個值表示從段落開頭到行起點的距離。

trans-unit.source: Gets the distance from the top to the baseline of the line of text.
trans-unit.target: 取得從文字行頂端到基準線的距離。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Double" /> value that represents the text baseline distance.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Double" /> 值，這個值表示文字基準線距離。

trans-unit.source: Gets the height of the text and any other content in the line.
trans-unit.target: 取得文字高度以及行中的任何其他內容。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Double" /> value.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Double" /> 值。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextLine.TextHeight%2A> may differ from the <xref:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextLine.Height%2A> property if the client specified the line height.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextLine.TextHeight%2A>可能不同於<xref:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextLine.Height%2A>屬性，如果用戶端指定線條高度。

trans-unit.source: Gets the number of whitespace code points beyond the last non-blank character in a line.
trans-unit.target: 取得超過行中最後一個非空白字元的空白字元字碼指標數。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Int32" /> value that represents the number of whitespace code points beyond the last non-blank character in a line.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Int32" /> 值，這個值表示超過行中最後一個非空白字元的空白字元字碼指標數。

trans-unit.source: Gets the width of a line of text, excluding trailing whitespace characters.
trans-unit.target: 取得文字行的寬度，不包括結尾的空白字元。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Double" /> that represents the text line width, excluding trailing whitespace characters.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Double" />，表示文字行的寬度，不包括結尾的空白字元。

trans-unit.source: Gets the width of a line of text, including trailing whitespace characters.
trans-unit.target: 取得文字行的寬度，包括結尾的空白字元。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Double" /> that represents the text line width, including trailing whitespace characters.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Double" />，表示文字行的寬度，包括結尾的空白字元。
